Articles.Content:
• KSP version: 1.5.1.2335, Windows 10 x64, bought on Steam
  • A detailed explanation finished the mission, review came up, but no information is within the data box. 
  • A screenshot https://imgur.com/a/sBsZTBG For the life of me, I cannot get screenshots to actually post properly. Anyone know why the link for images isn't working for me? 
  • A .craft file or save files doesn't seem relevant, as I tested and it happens on both of my saves. 
  • The ouput_log.txt or player.log No crash, no errors in log. 
  • A detailed list of system specifications 
    Intel i7 4930K
    Nvidia GTX 1080ti
    48 GB RAM
    8x SSD @ 2TB ea.
  • Are you running a clean installation, or have you updated and some of your persistence or craft files might be older versions, if so which version(s)
    Running stock version, clean install
Edited December 5, 2018 by Joker0720
Add Photo Link

It looks like you have the crew tab selected, I think.  Was there crew on the vessel?  Click on the parts or science tab to see what is listed under there.    Post screen shots of each.   You seem to be getting credit for science recovered though.
